Test Name: Western Equine Encephalitis Antibody, IgG and IgM
Purpose: To detect IgG and IgM antibodies against Western Equine Encephalitis virus for accurate diagnosis of current or prior infection.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: ELISA instrumentation including microplate reader (450 nm), incubator, centrifuge, adjustable pipettes
